name: A Slug's Dream
description:
A Slug’s Dream is a challenging yet accessible puzzle game about guiding an adorable slug dreaming about scrumptious flowers after skipping dinner through increasingly complex puzzles.

Thoughts for Food


Find your way across carefully handcrafted and dream-like puzzle levels designed to melt your brain with various mechanics and hindrances.
The goal of each puzzle is to eat all the flowers, and then reach for the exit.

Every day is a Sluggle


It’s not easy being "hangry" when you’re just a little gastropod having to deal with warping portals, different types of blocks, life-threatening elements and more.

Living that slug life


You're a slug, and that makes you very cool.


Key features:

  • Push, pull and rotate various materials with different properties, like clay or stone!
  • Transport objects and warp yourself through magical portals.
  • Manipulate rivers, avoid burning embers, and tread carefully on treacherous soil.
  • Ain’t every day you can play a slug!
